p: Patients with DENV were significantly younger than patients with CHIKV infection. DENV patients had a mean age of 33.6 years while CHIKV-infected patients had a mean age of 40.3 years ( Table 1). More than 80% of patients in both groups were adults, with males comprising 56.7% and 55.10% of the population for DENV and CHIKV, respectively.
